# Prying Eyes, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** V, S, M (a handful of crystal marbles)

**Range:** 1 mile

**Effect:** 10 or more levitating eyes

**Duration:** 1 hour/level; see text (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 326

This spell functions like *[[Prying Eyes (Spell)|prying eyes]]**,* except that the eyes can see all things as they actually are, just as if they had *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]* with a range of 120 feet. Thus, they can navigate darkened areas at normal speed. Also, a *greater prying eye*â€™s maximum [[Perception (Skill)|Perception]] modifier is +25 instead of +15.
